channel.title: Posts on Jordyn's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jordyn's blog

item.title: We've moved to hugo!
item.description: We’ve moved to a new blogging backend as you can see, We’re using hugo with the potato-dark theme instead of wordpress. We made this move for various reasons, the main reason being wordpress was slow and we didn’t need all that for a simple blog. If you want to contribute to this blog you can do it here: https://git.jordynsblog.org/jcjordyn120/blog
